credit_line: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
title: Visuele Communicatie Nederland, Stedelijk Museum Amsterdam
provenance: Van Sabben Poster Auctions, Horn, The Netherlands
description: Poster for a Dutch graphic design exhibition showing type against a ground of vertical bars resembling a bar code reading.  This work, like all of Crouwel posters, is based on a grid system (upon close inspection the pre-printed gridded paper is visible; each line represents 1 cm).  The letters of the major text are square, 4.5 x 4.5 cm, while the smaller letters in the subtext are also square, 1.3 x 1.3 cm.
name: Poster
